resources:
QuizzWizzApp
/*Question 1 questions and answers*/ In music, how many notes are there on the chromatic scale? 21 12 32 100
Which children\'s novel opens up with the line \'Where\'s papa going with that axe\'? Finding Nemo The Wizard of Oz Charlotte\'s web David Copperfield
What is the surname of the Simpson\'s long time neighbours in the American sitcom? Flanders Jones McDonalds Millers
Which 1990s American children\'s animated television series features toddlers: Tommy, Chuckie, twins Phil and Lil and Angelica? Recess Pokemon Wild Thornberrys Rugrats
Which sport features in the 1989 film Field of dreams starring Kevin Costner? Basketball Football Cricket Baseball
If you were drinking wine from the Stellenbosch region what country would it be from? South America India South Africa Zimbabwe
Which dance move swept the internet in 2016, where the dancer simultaneously drops their head while raising their arm and elbow? Juju on the beat Dab Nae nae Shmurdah dance
Lara Croft is a fictional character from which video game franchise? Tomb Raider Need for speed Grand theft auto Tekken
Which Colombian drug Lord was known as \'El Patron\'? Grizelda Blanco Pablo Escobar Tony Montana Juan Ramirez
Which mobile messaging service was created by Evan Spiegel, Bobby Murphy and Reggie Brown while still students at Stanford University? Twitter Instagram SnapScan SnapChat
The personality pictured below directed the award-winning movie \'Selma\' and produced acclaimed TV series \'Queen Sugar\', who is she? Shonda Rhimes Ava Duvernay Euzhan Palcy Gina Prince-Bythewood
/*Question 2 questions and answers*/
The Kardashian sisters pictured below are? Kim, Kendall, Kylie Kylie, Khloe,Kourtney Khloe, Kourtney, Kim Kendall, Kris, Kim
This personality hosts \'American idol\' and is a famed television and radio producer, who is he? Ryan Seacrest Tom Cruise Jay Leno Jerry Springer
Who plays Sasha Williams on the TV series \'The walking dead\'? Meagan Good Sanaa Lathan Kerri Washington Sonequa Martin
Actress Grace Gealey play which character on the Fox music series \'Empire\'?? Camilla Marks Carol Holloway Cookie Lyon Anika Calhoun
The cast members pictured below are from which abc drama series? Grey\'s Anatomy Scandal How to get away with murder Once upon a time
This TV and radio personality hosts a show with the same title as her name, who is she? Whoopi Goldberg Wendy Williams Oprah Winfrey Raven Symone
The Westbrook sisters gained their fame from which social media site? Instagram Facebook Twitter Snapchat
Oprah Winfrey owns which television network? abc Oprah Winfrey Network (OWN) Harpo productions The Oprah Winfrey show
The T.V personalities pictured below host which daytime talk show ? Real Talk The Talk The View The Real
/*Question 3 questions and answers*/ What is Theophilus London\'s middle name John Musa James Prince
The singer songwriter pictured below wrote Rihanna\'s \'Diamonds\' and sings \'Chandelier\' who is she? Kylie Minogue Nelly Furtado Sia Furler Sza
What is the name of Beyonce\'s latest album Lemonade Strawberries Lemon sauce Hot sauce
What is the opening line in Chris Brown\'s \'Fine by me\' ? She never stays to watch the night turn to day... She\'s like the wind, she comes and goes and again... She only loves me when the lights are off, lights are off... She doesn\'t call before midnight, if at all...
Rapper French Montana is originally from which African country Algeria Nigeria South Africa Morocco
What is the name of Nicki Minaj\'s latest album? The pink album The imprint The Pinkprint The print
Kanye West\'s third studio album was called? 808s and heartbreaks Graduation Yeezus The life of Pablo
The Westbrook sisters gained their fame from which social media site? Instagram Facebook Twitter Snapchat
Oprah Winfrey owns which television network? abc Oprah Winfrey Network (OWN) Harpo productions The Oprah Winfrey show
The T.V personalities pictured below host which daytime talk show ? Real Talk The Talk The View The Real
